Author: veRx#7033
Content: Hi team, I have just upgraded my Agama wallet from v0.2.0 to v0.5.7. Haven't opened the wallet in ages basically. I do have a wallet.dat backup though. I wanna be more actively involved again. How do I go about reinstating my (old) wallet? Your guidance is appreciated.

Author: veRx#7033
Content: Also, I heard that (some) wallet balances have been moved to preempt a security issue. How can I ascertain whether my wallet was also affected, and how do I recover my balance if indeed affected?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: if you were on v0.2.0 your funds would be unaffected. The vunerability was isolated to some versions of 0.3.x

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: you can check you current balance at https://dexstats.info/assetviewer.php by searching your address

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: with native mode, just starting the updated wallet with your existing wallet.dat in situ (and waiting for it to sync) will work. It is highly recommended to secure your seed and private keys though, otherwise if your hard drive or computer breaks you lose the wallet.dat and the funds within.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024424-how-to-secure-your-wallet-seed-private-keys-wallet-dat-file

Author: veRx#7033
Content: @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator  Thanks a lot. Much appreciated!

Author: veRx#7033
Content: @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator How long is the sync process likely to take if I'm on block 792819 currently?

Author: veRx#7033
Content: Also, the display of the wallet states it is syncing ('Synchronization in progress...'), but I do not see the block number increase (it remains on 792819). Is this normal wallet behavior?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: you probably need to reindex

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: alternatively you can use a bootstrap

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: it all depends on your bandwidth, but a reindex takes a few hours

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: best to run overnight

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024490-agama-launch-parameters

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@tahoeminer don't use that version
Install https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.5.7-4
Disable proxy: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers/
Sign in using old seed phrase: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029966-logging-into-verus-agama-with-an-existing-private-key-or-seed

you can search your address here: kmdexplorer.io
for your transaction history

Content: thanks!

Author: G888#0307
Content: My wallet v0.5.7-4 never syncs.... i get a perpetual "loading data please wait" and it never syncs or turns into a processing bar with a percentage.. should i reindex or?

Author: G888#0307
Content: It hasnt been that long since i sync'ed, 20-30 days max

Author: G888#0307
Content: Any advice much appreciated

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @G888 can you confirm that you are using native mode?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@G888 
Find the Komodo data directory. Depending on the OS, the location is as follows:

Linux: ~/.komodo
macOS/OSX: ~/Library/Application Support/Komodo
Windows: %APPDATA%/Komodo

delete the following files/folders

blocks
chainstate
notarisations
komodostate
komodostate.ind
peers.dat

DO NOT delete wallet.dat
back it up

download https://bootstrap.dexstats.info/KMD-bootstrap.tar.gz
extract it into the Komodo directory

Author: G888#0307
Content: Yes - in native mode

Author: G888#0307
Content: Ok thank you

smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: @Tropical Miner I assume you;ve downloaded and installed Verus Agama. I assume your wallet.dat file from running in native earlier is still in its original folder. If so, all you need to do is successfully sync the chain, or extract your private key and use lite mode.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: to get your private key, load up Verus Agama and go to the recieve screen, then follow the image below

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: If resync is not working for you, you can try and download the bootstrap from https://dexstats.info/bootstrap.php

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: it will take a few hours. once done, follow this guide to clear out the old data - https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024513-how-to-resync-komodo-from-scratch-in-agama-windows-linux-osx-

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: then extract the bootstrap into the folder for your operating system as mentioned in the guide above.
